name: Saw Room
description:
My entry for Disc room game jam!

Welcome to the Saw room: A small pico-8 demake of the Disc Room game!

  • Create your own difficulty
    • Pick which saws will you dodge, how often will they spawn and which abilities will you use!
    • Try different combinations to find the right challenge for you!
  • Beat your high score
    • Go for the best time, best saws or both! 

This is my first "real"game. So far I only made multiple demos or game concepts, but this is the first time I actually made something with title screen, UI and a proper game loop. There's even some sound design!
Thanks to my girlfriend for making the soundtrack!

 Even though it's not the most original of all the entries, I am really proud of what I made. The disc room concept is amazingly fun to work with and experiment!
